originalText.text: Very happy with my experience. The staff is so compassionate and thoughtful.  Shout out to Ellen for giving the best care to the minutest details throughout the entire treatment process.  Ellen's post-treatment follow up is especially heart-warming.  She checks in proactively and provide timely response to any questions.  It is very rare to  get this level of care and service nowadays. Thank you!! I really appreciate the team's care as my skin continues to experience visible changes every day!

originalText.text: Serene Cosmetic Acupuncture is an absolute gem in Manhattan. From the moment I walked in, I felt a wave of calm wash over me. The ambiance is soothing, the staff is professional, and the results are outstanding. My skin feels and looks amazing after just one session. I highly recommend Serene to anyone looking for a holistic approach to beauty and wellness. Will definitely be returning!

text.text: Serene Cosmetic Acupuncture is an absolute gem in Manhattan. From the moment I walked in, I felt a wave of calm wash over me. originalText.text: The cosmetic acupuncture treatment provided by Serene Cosmetic Acupuncture has proven to be very effective. After each session, there is a noticeable lifting effect on the facial muscles and a significant reduction in wrinkles. What's most important is that this treatment utilizes the body's natural self-regulating abilities to improve the condition of the skin. After a few sessions, I personally felt much younger.

originalText.text: Dr. Serene Feng completely changed my notion of medicine. The treatment and my experience with it has been one of a kind. I am 50+ and wants to rejuvenate and brighten up my tired-looking dull  face with fine lines and wrinkles. I tried beauty salon, Botox, and mesotherapy but the results are superficial and don't last. Dr. Feng's traditional Chinese medicine goes way deeper and identifies the root case of my problem - sever energy blockage to the meridians corresponding to liver and spleen. While she was explaining what could have caused the blockage, i.e. sudden shock or emotions, I was in tears recalling the sudden loss of a loved one from 10 years ago and the subsequent deep grief, sadness and emotional pain. Dr. Feng applied acupuncture on those blocked meridians to re-activate the channel and reestablish the flow of chi and blood circulation. After several treatments, my skin tones begin to change, becomes brighter  with luster. Dr. Feng's treatment inspired me to make peace with my past.  Moving on is the key to health. Sticking to the past and dwelling on the pain of loss will block our meridians and cause Chi stagnancy.  Let it go.  I can't thank you enough to Dr. Feng for her extraordinary practice of this amazing ancient Chinese medicine - acupuncture!  I hope my experience-sharing will be helpful to your pursuit of beauty and health.
